name.baseName: Fullaccountinglink(forwastewater)|Printedproducts(substrateismetal)|Metal|Lithographic printing, stencil printing (screen printing), letterpress printing (flexographic printing), digital printing|All sizes
全部核算环节（废水用）|印刷品（承印物为金属）|金属|平版印刷、孔版印刷（丝网印刷）、凸版印刷（柔性版印刷）、数字印刷|所有规模

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisDirect discharge，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = 1

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisDirect discharge，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = 1
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该数据集代表了在金属基材上的多种印刷工艺，包括平版印刷、孔版印刷（丝网印刷）、凸版印刷（柔性版印刷）和数字印刷。这些工艺适用于生产高质量的印刷金属产品，适用于工业和消费者应用，例如产品标签、标牌、装饰应用和复杂的电子部件。末端处理技术将使用过的油、氨氮和化学需氧量等污染物直接排放，无需额外处理。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码23,三级代码231.0文件，在完整版文件中第521页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution used oilisDirect discharge，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = 1
污染物指标动植物油的末端治理技术是直排。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为动植物油，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the treatment technology for the pollution of Waste waterdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = 1
污染物指标工业废水量的末端治理技术未说明。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为工业废水量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
源文件中描述为为印刷品（承印物为金属），此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
